name: @daneroo/qcic-docz
description: Static front end (docz) for qcic, with status of scrobblecast and im-ted1k
author: Daniel Lauzon <daniel.lauzon@gmail.com>

scripts.fix: rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules && yarn install && npm i --package-lock-only
scripts.deploy: npm run docz:build && npm run deploy:now
scripts.deploy:now: cp now.json dist/ && cd dist && now --public --target production && now rm --safe --yes docz-qcic
scripts.testWithAuditLater: npm run lint && npm audit && npm run unit
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
